full_summary:
Acquisition of High-Speed Cameras and Accessories
================

## Announcement Details

### Reference Number
*cb-795-15335629*

### Amendment Number
*7*

### Solicitation Number
*24-58013*

### Publication Date
*April 18, 2024*

### Tender Closing Date and Time
*May 15, 2024, 2:00 PM EDT*

## Description
The National Research Council Canada (NRC) is issuing a request for proposal (RFP) for the procurement of high-speed cameras and accessories. The aim is to develop digitized quantitative evaluation approaches for the performance assessment of existing construction and the quality assessment of new buildings and infrastructure.

## Objectives

* To create tools that can provide accurate data for asset management
* To reduce the risk of failure and assess damage and residual capacity after extreme events in a short timeframe
* To utilize high-technology imaging devices and data processing equipment

## Tender Requirements

* High-speed cameras ( UNSPSC: *45121511 *)
* Accessories (as required)
* The tenderer must be able to provide technical specifications and demonstrations of the proposed equipment
* The tenderer must have experience in providing similar services to government organizations

## Contract Duration

* The proposed contract is expected to begin on *May 20, 2024* and end on *July 31, 2024*

## Trade Agreements

This procurement is subject to the following trade agreements:

* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

## Regions of Opportunity

The tender is open to vendors worldwide.

## Regions of Delivery

The equipment will be delivered to Ottawa, Canada.

## Contact Information

For further information, please contact:

* Stéphane Lajoie, National Research Council Canada
* Email: [stephane.lajoie@nrc-cnrc.gc.ca](mailto:stephane.lajoie@nrc-cnrc.gc.ca)
* Phone: (514) 210-7395
